thread.title: Jerome Cruz
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Jerome Cruz

author: Jerome Cruz
title: Jerome Cruz
text: The experience of having to move is hard enough as is with all the things that have to be done the let downs and road blocks. Leave you frustrated and down. But the assistance of the people at poblic storage let me know that not all this has a to be gloom and doom i have my valuable safe and secure with in multiple locked area with round the clock presents for assistance and security i know when got to retrieve my belongings they will all be there and with the added insurance policy that is smartly place mandatory i can rest at ease and deal with the important issues at hand very pleased and id recommend if you have to store things or are in need of extra space use public storage
